name: octoscout
description: Slack bot that sends pull requests and review information for github users.

HUBOT_SLACK_TOKEN.description: The token you are given by Slack when you add the Hubot integration.

HUBOT_SLACK_TEAM.description: Your team's Slack subdomain. e.g. if your team is https://myteam.slack.com/, you would enter 'myteam' here.

GITHUB_API_TOKEN.description: The Github API token used to query Github API

GITHUB_ORGANIZATION.description: The name of the Github organization to query for pending reviews
